items.name: Monkey in the Jungle
items.shortDescription: Digital image of a monkey holding an orb in the jungle.
items.longDescription: This digital image depicts a monkey sitting in a tree, holding a glowing orb in its hand. The monkey is surrounded by lush green jungle foliage.

items.name: Ship on the Ocean
items.shortDescription: Digital image of a ship sailing on the ocean.
items.longDescription: This digital image depicts a sailing ship on a calm ocean, with blue skies and fluffy white clouds in the background.

items.name: City in the Valley
items.shortDescription: Digital image of a city nestled in a valley.
items.longDescription: This digital image depicts a sprawling city nestled in a lush green valley, surrounded by mountains in the distance.
